field.label: Registration Pages
field.helptext: What Skuid pages are used for this registration workflow?

field.label: Permitted email domains
field.helptext: A comma-delimited list of allowed email domains for users created through the signup API. If none are provided, all email domains are allowed.

field.label: Registration URL

skuid__text.contents: This {{^$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}profile{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}{{#$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}site permission set{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}} is in use. You must assign a different {{^$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}profile{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}{{#$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}site permission set{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}} to each user currently assigned to this one before it can be deleted.

Are you sure you want to permanently delete this {{^$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}profile{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}{{#$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}site permission set{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}? You can't undo this.

skuid__text.contents: No data source objects available
There are no data sources created for this site.
Once you set up one or more data sources, you will be able to control access to them for this profile.

Enable user registration for this {{^$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}profile{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}{{#$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}site permission set{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}
Enable to allow custom user creation method from REST calls or any Skuid pages.

A customized registration page for the {{^$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}profile{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}{{#$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}site permission set{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}} is optional—but can create a better user experience.

This {{^$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}profile{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}{{#$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}site permission set{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}} will no longer use the custom signup pages that you created, and will return to using the default signup pages.

skuid__text.contents:
This allows user accounts to be created without administrator intervention. You can create one self-registration method for each {{^$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}profile{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}{{#$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}site permission set{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}. 

More about the User Registration API
